page.description: Get the height of the page.

argument.name: Height
argument.description: The height of the print image.

page.discussion: The EXTENT_HEIGHT()function is available for use inside of the code section of the UI_PRINTER_DRAW() function. It returns the height of the print image in inches. Used only in the code section of UI_PRINTER_DRAW().

section.description: This section of code uses EXTENT_HEIGHT() to determine the height of the print image being created.
section.example: page_description = <<%code% ... 'this tells me how big the page is in inches page_width = extent_width() page_height = extent_height() ... %code%
